headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Special Vehicles Now Available in the Stunt Race Creator
content: The Special Vehicle Circuit update has expanded the toolbox for the brilliant Creator community to take things up a few notches. In addition to the Rocket Voltic, Ruiner 2000 and Blazer Aqua becoming available in the Stunt Race Creator, we've added a collection of new Props designed to highlight these vehiclesâ€™ unique abilities, including Hurdles, Boost Refills and Explosive Crates.
